sen.j: かま風呂は京都市左京区八瀬周辺に存在する日本古式のサウナの一種。
sen.e: Kamaburo is a kind of Japanese traditional sauna baths existing around Yase, Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City.
Kamaburo is a kind of Japanese traditional sauna baths existing around Yase, Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City.
Kamaburo is a kind of Japanese traditional sauna baths existing around Yase, Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City.

sen.j: 巨大なかまくら型の竈の中に入り蒸気浴を行う。
sen.e: People enter a huge kamado (furnace) shaped like a kamakura (hut made of snow) and take vapor bath.
People enter a huge kamado (furnace) shaped like a kamakura (hut made of snow) and take vapor bath.
People enter a huge kamado (furnace) shaped like a kamakura (hut made of snow) and take vapor bath.

sen.j: 現在では「ふるさと」と「平八茶屋」で利用することが出来る。
sen.e: At present, kamaburo is available in "Furusato" and "Heihachi-jaya".
sen.cmt: 引用符の中の語句が欠落していたので、Webを参考にして補いました。
sen.e: At present, kamaburo is available in "Furusato" and "Heihachi-jaya".
At present, kamaburo is available in "Furusato" and "Heihachi-jaya".

sen.j: かま風呂はかまくら型の竈をモデルとして作られた京都銘菓。
sen.e: Kamaburo is a famous confection of Kyoto which has been modeled after 1.
Kamaburo is a famous confection of Kyoto which has been modeled after 1.
Kamaburo is a famous confection of Kyoto which has been modeled after the kamakura-shaped kamado explained above.
sen.cmt: Webには番号が付いていますが、これには付いていないので１．ではなく説明に変えました。

sen.j: 薄い小麦の皮の中に餡が詰まった形状。
sen.e: It is shaped from thin flour layer like a pancake with an (been jam) stuffed in it.
It is made of thin wheat flour layer outside and an (been jam) stuffed inside.
It is a thin layer of wheat-flour dough shaped like kamaburo with bean jam stuffed inside.
